ygData.subject: Divine Barrier
ygData.msgSnippet: I m level 28, only a handfull of spells shy of level 29 and I have all my spells in my backpack so that as soon as I level I can learn them.  I was just
ygData.messageBody:
I'm level 28, only a handfull of spells shy of level 29 and I have all my spells in my backpack so that as soon as I level I can learn them. I was just wondering if anybody can tell me anything about the Divine Barrier spell? I know that it is an upgrade to Divine Aura, but what does it improve on? Does it last longer? It can't possibly cast any quicker or cost less mana =). I already bought the spell so if it's a waste, then so be it... just wondering what advantages this spell has over its predecessor.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
